titleStmt.title: The life and death of George of Oxford: to a pleasant new tune, called, Poor Georgy.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby in West-smithfield.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "As I went over London Bridge ..."
Place and date of publication from Wing.

Wing states there are variants. This edition printed in four columns with an ornamental rule between the first two columns and a "mourning" rule between the last two. There are two woodcuts above the first two columns.
Reproduction of originals in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
